text: @realDonaldTrump Absolute muppet, we're on lock down in the UK because idiots decided they should ignore the advice of experts and the government. But in the US, the feckin' President wants people back to work spreading and contracting the coronavirus. Good Luck 🍀 All about them dollar bills.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
